author: cedricsagne
title: A decent starter Bionicle set
review:
This is my son's first Bionicle box, although he already has 31007 which is a Creator robot box.

Box/Instructions

The box is a foldable, with a bag and instructions. Just perfect

Parts

The parts are Bionicle, which means they have some technic and then the robot parts, which I am at a loss to give names to. The robot has two masks, one is the fire mask, and the other a green mask which sort of evokes the Predator creature from the films.

Minifigures

No minifigures.

 

The build

The build was reasonably easy. I am astonished that my son, who is just 5 1/2 can build this model rather easily. He is now playing daily with Technic parts too so I guess he's not the usual 5 year old either.

The completed model

Awesome, although a bit short. The body is articulated on a torso piece, it's stable, limbs move rather gracefully. The firing weapon shoots and the projectiles need to be controled otherwise they'd get lost easily, the fire swords look a bit odd but they have nice colours.

Overall opinion

Not sure what and how you can build more complex or different robots with more Bionicle sets, but as individual boxes at least they look good
